attributes.action: Allow vehicles over the age of 25 to be exempt from ULEZ charging
attributes.additional_details: The vast majority of owners of vehicles over 25 years old are car enthusiasts, and their car means a lot to them. However, ULEZ and similar schemes mean that they cannot afford to keep their vehicles that mean so much to them. I would like the 40 year old ULEZ exemption to extend to vehicles over 25 years old. Many legends such as the Ford Escort RS Cosworth, the Renault 5 GT Turbo and the iconic Rover Mini will fall victim to being lost due to such schemes.
attributes.background: Almost all owners of vehicles 25 and older are car enthusiasts and their pride and joy should be exempt from ULEZ and similar schemes.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about local charges for road usage are a matter for individual local authorities, not the UK Government or Parliament.

We currently have the following petitions open on related issues:

Remove local authority powers to introduce LTNs, CAZs, LEZs and ULEZs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/637517

Give everyone within the Home Counties a vote for the London Mayor.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643187

Require Local Authorities to give 28 days to pay road charging fines
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/642842
